page.title: 07THE MOBILE SHOP IN ABERNYTE
page.content: There is a mobile grocery van in Abernyte which is known as "Andie's Van".The owner has the shop and the van.He drives it ina radius of 6 miles around his shop in Abernyte.Many of his customers are old people or people who do not have cars.He keeps his van in the garage next to his shop.He can refill it every day,with fresh bread, vegetables,dairy produce,freezerfood, sweets and other groceries.Regulations say he is only allowed to carry a certain amount of food.At one time he had a lot of customers but now many go to the supermarkets in Perth or Dundee If his customer is out they leave a note.He gets anything his customers ask him for as there is not that much variety in his van.The van is a green 3 ton Ford van when empty and 4 ton if full.It costs Â£290 to tax a year.The V.G.Van is 17 years old.
